lead_paragraph: The American Stores Company, parent of the Sav-On-Drugs chain, said it planned to buy all 85 CVS Pharmacy drugstores in California. Terms of the deal were not disclosed. A spokesman for American, Troy D'Ambrosio, said on Friday that the deal was expected to be completed in February. The stores will retain the CVS name for at least a year, he said.
